SystemSolaire

Class SaveHtmlProg

  • java.lang.Object
    • SystemSolaire.SaveHtmlProg

  • public class SaveHtmlProg
extends java.lang.Object
    SaveHtmlProg is a Java Class whit it we can generate a sitemap.xml and the indexation of the Html Files by giving the file of departure which contains all the pages. -this class need two attribute : -an ArrayList of HtmlFile to save all Html files who are present in the Directory -and a GeneratSiteMap to genre the sitemapx.xml -by using the method compresseAll we can brows recursively the Directory and collect , all Html Files And stored those instance of HtmlFile in the ArrayList , then we can generate the sitemap.xml file by the method sauvgardeSiteMap , and the indexation by the method sauvgardeIndexation
    Since:
    JDK8.0
    Version:
    1.8.0_144 created at 19 Dec,2017
    Author:
    Ayad Ishak and Arhab Samira
    See Also:
    HtmlFile, GeneratSiteMap

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SaveHtmlProg()
      Construct and initialize a SaveHtmlProg , we initialize the ArrayList of HtmlFile and initialize the GeneratSiteMap by using her Construct.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHtml(HtmlFile html)
      this method can add a instanceOf HtmlFile in the ArrayList we add it if and only if one of her tags(TITLE,H1) are not null
      void compresseAll(java.lang.String dossier, java.lang.String freq)
      this method browse the tree of Html Directory's recursively by this browse we create the instances of SiteMap and add it to the GeneratSiteMap also create the instances of HtmlFile and add it to the ArrayList after that we collect her tags TITLE and H1
      void compresseAllJarIndex(java.lang.String dossier)
      it's the same method as compresseAll but here we use it in the console mode because in the console model at each execution we leave the code so the ArrayList of HtmlFile will be empty so in this case we have to re-brows the directory and generate the Indexation
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllH1(java.lang.String H1)
      this method use The reverse process of creating object from sequence of bytes is called deserialization.

      this method use The reverse process of creating object from sequence of bytes is called deserialization.

      this method use The reverse process of creating object from sequence of bytes is called deserialization.
      long getNumberOfPages()
      this method gives us the number of Files Html which are present on the indexation and the site map

      this method use The reverse process of creating object from sequence of bytes is called deserialization.

      this method use The reverse process of creating object from sequence of bytes is called deserialization.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> rechercheByTitle(java.lang.String title)
      this method use The reverse process of creating object from sequence of bytes is called deserialization.
      void sauvgardeIndexation(java.lang.String title)
      this method can generate a Ser File serial file which Contain the ArrayList of HtmlFile Serialization is a process introduced in JDK version 1.1 that makes it possible to create an object or object graph of the JVM persistent for storage or exchange and vice versa
      void sauvgardeIndexationJar(java.lang.String dossier, java.lang.String title)
      *it's the same method as sauvgardeIndexation but here we use it in the console mode because in the console model at each execution we leave the code so the ArrayList of HtmlFile will be empty so in this case we have to re-brows the directory to generate the Indexation
      void sauvgardeSiteMap(java.lang.String dossier, java.lang.String freq, java.lang.String title)
      this method can genre a site map by using the method of writing in GeneratSiteMap

      this method can print our ArrayList of HtmlFile

    • Method Detail

      • addHtml

        public void addHtml(HtmlFile html)
        this method can add a instanceOf HtmlFile in the ArrayList we add it if and only if one of her tags(TITLE,H1) are not null
        Parameters:
        html - the instance of HtmlFile that we will add

      • compresseAll

        public void compresseAll(java.lang.String dossier,
                         java.lang.String freq)
        this method browse the tree of Html Directory's recursively by this browse we create the instances of SiteMap and add it to the GeneratSiteMap also create the instances of HtmlFile and add it to the ArrayList after that we collect her tags TITLE and H1
        Parameters:
        dossier - the Directory path of departure which contains all the Html Files
        freq - How frequently the page is likely to change. This value provides general information to search engines, and may not correlate exactly to how often they crawl the page, the correct Values are : always, hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, never,
        See Also:
        HtmlFile, GeneratSiteMap

      • sauvgardeSiteMap

        public void sauvgardeSiteMap(java.lang.String dossier,
                             java.lang.String freq,
                             java.lang.String title)
        this method can genre a site map by using the method of writing in GeneratSiteMap
        Parameters:
        dossier - the Directory path of departure which contains all the Html Files
        freq - How frequently the page is likely to change. always,hourly,daily,weekly,monthly,yearly,never,
        title - the title of the Xml File that we will genre by this method

      • sauvgardeIndexation

        public void sauvgardeIndexation(java.lang.String title)
        this method can generate a Ser File serial file which Contain the ArrayList of HtmlFile Serialization is a process introduced in JDK version 1.1 that makes it possible to create an object or object graph of the JVM persistent for storage or exchange and vice versa
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the Ser File that we will genre by this method
        See Also:
        ObjectOutputStream

      • compresseAllJarIndex

        public void compresseAllJarIndex(java.lang.String dossier)
        it's the same method as compresseAll but here we use it in the console mode because in the console model at each execution we leave the code so the ArrayList of HtmlFile will be empty so in this case we have to re-brows the directory and generate the Indexation
        Parameters:
        dossier - the title of the Ser File that we will genre by this method

      • sauvgardeIndexationJar

        public void sauvgardeIndexationJar(java.lang.String dossier,
                                   java.lang.String title)
        *it's the same method as sauvgardeIndexation but here we use it in the console mode because in the console model at each execution we leave the code so the ArrayList of HtmlFile will be empty so in this case we have to re-brows the directory to generate the Indexation
        Parameters:
        dossier - the title of the Ser File that we will genre by this method
        title - the title of the Ser File that we will genre by this method
        See Also:
        ObjectOutputStream, FileOutputStream

      • getH1ByLinkFile

        public java.lang.String getH1ByLinkFile(java.lang.String linke)
        this method use The reverse process of creating object from sequence of bytes is called deserialization. we recover the data.ser file in a ArrayList of HtmlFile then we will do our search by browsing the ArrayList
        Parameters:
        linke - the link to search
        Returns:
        the H1 tag of this Html file how have the title passed as a parameter if he exist else null
        See Also:
        ObjectInputStream, FileInputStream
